page.title: 10THE WORK OF THE VICAR
page.content: Condover Parish is the most northern parish in the Hereford diocese.The Vicar preaches at Pitchford,Acton Burnell,Frodsley and Condover,also a small mission church at Ryton.Acton Burnell,Frodsley and Pitchford are visited twice a month.Only Condover has services every week.In earlier times each parish had its own vicar, but they are now combined.In addition the Church of England is short of money and can't pay many clergymen. The Vicar has been with this parish approximately one year and has inherited readers and helpers from the last incumbent.In general each area parish church is well attended in relation to it's population and congregation which are growing.Each is fortunate in having it's own organist.
